abstract: Reliance Industries’ $392 million deal with Carrizo Oil and Gas is the latest in a series in which Reliance has been paying top dollar to tap into the American natural gas market.
snippet: Reliance Industries’ $392 million deal with Carrizo Oil and Gas is the latest in a series in which Reliance has been paying top dollar to tap into the American natural gas market.
lead_paragraph: Reliance Industries of India continues to pay top dollar to tap into the natural gas market in the United States, pushing up what some people in the energy industry think are exorbitant prices to obtain unconventional shale gas. Reliance’s $392 million deal with Carrizo Oil and Gas is just one of several shale transactions that are expected by energy bankers.

headline.main: Reliance’s Big Bet on a Pricey Shale Deal
